plot: Kyle sets out to prove that 9/11 wasn't a government conspiracy, and actually uncovers a government conspiracy to create a conspiracy.

Mr. Mackey become furious when he discovers a turd in one of the urinals in the boys washroom and sets out to find the culprit; Cartman attempts to find out who really caused 9/11; Stan and Kyle reach out to a 9/11 conspiracy group and get more than they bargained for.
